jodd.madvoc.interceptor

Class AnnotatedPropertyInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.interceptor.AnnotatedPropertyInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionWrapper, ActionInterceptor

    public abstract class AnnotatedPropertyInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionInterceptor
    Performs some operation on all annotated properties. Helpful with injection of application context into action objects.
